service.composite

Class CompositeService

  • java.lang.Object
    • service.auxiliary.AbstractService
      • service.composite.CompositeService
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    MessageReceiver

    public class CompositeService
extends AbstractService
    Providing an abstraction to create composite services

                                               java.lang.Object[] params)

      • containServices

        public boolean containServices(java.lang.String serviceType,
                               java.lang.String opName)
        Returns true if composite service cache contains instances of the specific service type with operation name
        Parameters:
        serviceType - the service type
        opName - the operation name
        Returns:
        true if cache has service with the same type and operation, otherwise false

      • stopRetrying

        public void stopRetrying()
        If a service failed and composite service is retrying, this method will effect to stop retrying for that service. This method once called will effect only one service invocation/thread.
